items.title: Heracles huurt AZ-spits Zeefuik met optie tot koop
items.summary: We zitten in het intermezzo tussen de zomer- en winterwindow, toch druppelt er in het najaar vaak nog een aantal transfers binnen. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: Sarri uit frustratie over transferbeleid Lazio en kent nieuwe spits niet
items.summary: Maurizio Sarri is niet blij met de verkoop van Matt√©o Guendouzi aan Fenerbah√ße. De trainer van Lazio uitte na het gelijkspel tegen Fiorentina niet voor het eerst zijn frustatie over het transferbeleid van de Italiaanse club, die ook een spits heeft aangetrokken die Sarri totaal niet kent.

items.title: Terry Yorath, former Wales and Leeds midfielder, dies aged 75
items.summary: Yorath played a big part in the Leeds team under Don Revie, winning the First Division title, before spells with Coventry, Tottenham and Bradford The former Leeds and Wales midfielder Terry Yorath has died at the age of 75 following a short illness, his family have said in a statement. Born in Cardiff, Yorath played a big part in the Leeds team under Don Revie, winning the First Division title, before spells with Coventry, Tottenham and Bradford. He also won 59 caps for Wales. Continue reading...

items.title: Meer problemen voor Real: ook R√ºdiger onzeker voor Madrileense derby
items.summary: Antonio R√ºdiger moet de halve finale van de Spaanse Super Cup tegen Atl√©tico Madrid mogelijk aan zich voorbij laten gaan. De centrale verdediger worstelt met knieproblemen. Eerder werd bekend dat ook Kylian Mbapp√© El Derbi Madrile√±o niet gaat halen .

items.title: Football transfer rumours: Ethan Nwaneri to replace Semenyo at Bournemouth?
items.summary: Today‚Äôs rumours are riding the District line Antoine Semenyo‚Äôs farewell goal for Bournemouth, before his move to Manchester City, sets off a chain reaction over who succeeds him. Ethan Nwaneri, who has struggled for game time at Arsenal, is wanted by a few suitors. Bournemouth are very interested in a loan move for someone who was the next big thing not too long ago. And still can be, though the word is he still wishes to stay a Gunner and play his part in a title-winning team. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Ugarte kan relatief gezien helemaal niet goed voetballen'
items.summary: Manuel Ugarte staat evenals Daley Blind hoog op het verlanglijstje van Ajax. De Amsterdammers zijn nog altijd op zoek naar een nieuwe nummer 6. De serieuze belangstelling in de spelers van respectievelijk Manchester United en Girona wordt besproken in de nieuwe aflevering van VI ZSM.

items.title: England player ratings after another away Ashes series goes wrong
items.summary: Here is how we rated England's players out of 10 after the 4-1 Ashes series defeat in Australia...

items.title: Telstar: van vreemde eend in de bijt tot mooie zwaan
items.summary: Op een paar uitzonderingen na die juist net in een flow waren geraakt, haalden de Eredivisie-clubs op het tandvlees de winterstop. Veel tijd om weer op adem te komen, hebben ze alleen niet, want dit weekeinde begint het hele circus alweer. In aanloop naar het cruciale deel van het seizoen maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat de volgorde betreft uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: de verrassende promovendus Telstar.

items.title: Cristian Romero takes apparent swipe at Spurs board for staying silent as team struggle
items.summary: Reference to ‚Äòlies‚Äô deleted from his social media post ‚ÄòIt should be other people coming out to speak,‚Äô he writes Cristian Romero has taken an apparent swipe at Tottenham‚Äôs board for staying silent amid the team‚Äôs struggles. The captain posted a strongly worded message after Wednesday‚Äôs 3-2 defeat at Bournemouth that initially appeared to accuse the hierarchy of telling ‚Äúlies‚Äù before being edited to remove that incendiary reference. What remained on Romero‚Äôs Instagram post, though, was what an apparent call for the Spurs directors to speak up. The players were again subjected to abuse by some of their fans after a latest loss that leaves Tottenham with five points from their past six matches, three of which have ended in defeat. Continue reading...

items.title: Man United ask Fletcher to coach FA Cup Sunday
items.summary: Darren Fletcher said he will be on the touchline for Manchester United's FA Cup tie against Brighton on Sunday.

items.title: Rosenior unready to coach Chelsea loss at Fulham
items.summary: Liam Rosenior chose not to take charge of Chelsea for the first time in Wednesday's Premier League clash against Fulham because of the "difficult time-frame" between his appointment on Tuesday and the game at Craven Cottage.

items.title: Semenyo gets 'fairytale ending' before City move
items.summary: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola all but confirmed Antoine Semenyo's impending transfer to Manchester City as he hailed the winger's "fairytale ending" in scoring a late winner against Tottenham Hotspur on Wednesday.

items.title: Aaronson scores twice, concedes pen in Leeds loss
items.summary: Harvey Barnes snatched a 4-3 victory over Leeds as Newcastle served up a seven-goal Premier League thriller of which Kevin Keegan would be proud.

items.title: A warrior touched by tragedy - Terry Yorath obituary
items.summary: Former Wales captain and manager Terry Yorath, who has died aged 75, had a glittering career, but his life was deeply affected by two tragedies.

items.title: Leeds and Wales legend Yorath dies aged 75
items.summary: Terry Yorath, who won the league title with Leeds in 1974 and came close to guiding Wales to the 1994 World Cup finals, dies at the age of 75.

items.title: Fresh start or back to square one? Either way, Man United are never dull
items.summary: After the tumult of Ruben Amorim's dismissal on Monday, Darren Fletcher and Manchester United's 2-2 draw vs. Burnley was fittingly dramatic.

items.title: Brook sorry for 'embarrassing' clash with bouncer in New Zealand
items.summary: England's Harry Brook has apologised for "embarrassing myself and the team" after an altercation with a nightclub bouncer in New Zealand last autumn.

items.title: Sabalenka to skip events in 'insane' 2026 despite likely WTA sanctions
items.summary: Aryna Sabalenka expects to skip events again this year rather than put her health at risk ‚Äåover the course of an "insane" season, even though she knows she is likely to be sanctioned by the WTA ‚ÄãTour for doing so, the world No 1 said.

items.title: Romero appears to blast Spurs hierarchy for 'lies' in now-edited social media post
items.summary: Tottenham captain Cristian Romero appeared to blast the club's hierarchy for "lies" in a now-edited social media post.

items.title: Smith targets 'statement' win to become Britain's latest boxing champion
items.summary: Dalton Smith firmly believes he can overpower feared puncher Subriel Matias as he aims to become Britain‚Äôs newest world champion this weekend.
